net.sf.mmm.transaction.impl.spring

Class SpringTransactionExecutor.SpringTransactionAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.mmm.transaction.base.AbstractTransactionExecutor.AbstractTransactionAdapter<org.springframework.transaction.TransactionStatus>
      • net.sf.mmm.transaction.impl.spring.SpringTransactionExecutor.SpringTransactionAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TransactionAdapter
    Enclosing class:
    SpringTransactionExecutor

    private class SpringTransactionExecutor.SpringTransactionAdapter
extends AbstractTransactionExecutor.AbstractTransactionAdapter<org.springframework.transaction.TransactionStatus>
    This is the implementation of the TransactionAdapter interface using spring-tx.
